comments.comment: Its the extreme incompetence  and complete  disregard for national security on part of this govt. that has enabled people like wimal to raise their heads again. But ,despite his many flaws , he has never been a traitor to the country. In 2008 when the war effort was coming to an end he helped to defeat unps and jvps effort to defeat the budget and call for a general strike. This stupid govt. by ignoring security 100% has ruined the country's security and economy for God knows how long ! Even wimal would have had better judgement.

comments.comment: This is just a statement bassed on assumptions. I don't like  Vimal W personally, but if you are a better analyst you should argue his statement than what he was and is. If black is bad and white is good,then we understand that there are no politician or concept in this country who and which can be called white. Hence as we citizens we have no choice other than to select concepts and people who are grey but closer to white. In that respect I believ the previous regime was better than this. My belief is Based on  better quality of life they introduced( a war free society, developments both infarstucre and services). Because at the end of the day what matters to 99.99% of people such improved quality of life but  Not the subjective and judgemental statements like these.
